title: ‘Chocolate orange’ iced biscuits
description: Orange flavoured biscuits topped with bright orange icing and a simple chocolate icing. These easy biscuits will make you smile.
ingredients: 3 large oranges, finely grated zest only
450g/1lb plain flour, plus extra for flouring
½ - 1 tbsp cocoa powder (not the sweetened hot chocolate)
1 - 1½ tbsp liquid (juice from the zested orange above)
